alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:49AM CDT until July 06 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR LIPSCOMB...HUTCHINSON...SOUTHEASTERN HANSFORD...ROBERTS... HEMPHILL AND SOUTHERN OCHILTREE COUNTIES... At 348 AM CDT, automated weather equipment reported severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pringle to 11 miles southeast of Wolf Creek Park to 8 miles south of Follett, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Borger, Lipscomb, Canadian, Miami, Fritch, Stinnett, Follett, Higgins, Sanford, Wolf Creek Park, Glazier, Lake Marvin, Pringle, Lora and Codman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
